articles.author: AGENCY
articles.content:
Nomadland has won the Golden Globe for best picture drama, making history for the Globes, as well as for director Chloe Zhao and for the Nomadland producing team.
The win is the first time a film di… [+3711 chars]
articles.description: The director who produced 'Nomadland' as well is the first Asian woman to win Best Picture Drama as a producer.
articles.title: Chloe Zhao becomes second woman to win Golden Globe for directing in 78 years - The Star Online

articles.author: CNA
articles.content: MANILA: The Philippines received its first batch of COVID-19 vaccine on Sunday (Feb 28), among the last in Southeast Asia to secure the critical doses despite having the second-highest number of infe… [+3448 chars]
articles.description: MANILA: The Philippines received its first batch of COVID-19 vaccine on Sunday (Feb 28), among the last in Southeast Asia to secure the critical doses despite having the second-highest number of infections and deaths in the region.
articles.title: Philippines receives Sinovac's COVID-19 vaccine after delays - CNA
